channel.title: Quests
channel.description:
I've just made a command that simultaniously completes all quests , but it wont finish the following quests;
Lost City, Rune Mysteries, Sheep Shearer, Lunar Diplomacy and The Wolf's Cure. NOTE: All these quests are the ones that DON'T end in killing an NPC, meaning they aren't in my NPCHandler like the others.
So, can someone please post working codes for those quests and tell me what file they go in?
Thanks in advance, lets hope this post actually gets resolved for once.

item.title: Quests
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyofadown Mikeyofadown
item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

In other words lul. Instead of

public int questint = 0; in player.java (i.e. player class) do

public int questint = 15;

Change “questint” to whatever it is in your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Quests
item.dc:creator: @mad_Man_Joe mad Man Joe
item.description:
@mad_Man_Joe wrote:

Can you explain that more please? O.o

Read full topic

item.title: Quests
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Set there integer to 15 by default in the player class.

Read full topic
